utterances: I was wondering if you would like to join me for lunch. Maybe we can catch up outside of work.
How about the new sandwich shop that just opened up down the street? I heard they have great vegetarian options.
Great! So, are you free around noon?
Perfect. I'm looking forward to it.
Yes, it's always refreshing to have a change of conversation. So, how has your recovery been going? Are you feeling better now?
That's good to hear. I remember when I helped you walk to the couch a few weeks ago, it was just a temporary setback, right?
Of course, anytime. Hey, do you remember when I told you about my recent hunting trip? I tracked a deer for three hours before finally getting a shot. It was a proud moment for me.
Exactly, it's a great way to relax and unwind. Speaking of hobbies, do you have any hobbies you enjoy in your free time?
That's great, Doctor. It's important to have hobbies and interests that bring you joy outside of work.
Well, work has been keeping me busy, but I've also been planning a weekend trip with some friends. We're going hiking in the mountains.
Thank you, I'm looking forward to it. So, have you been to any new restaurants or tried any new foods lately?
Oh, I love Vietnamese food. I'll have to try that place out. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem at all, Doctor. It was great catching up with you. See you later.
Okay, Doctor, I think it's time for us to get some fresh air and sunshine. Let's go to the park today.
You're welcome, Doctor. I know how much you like going to the park, and I want to make sure you have a good time.
I try to be. I just want you to be happy and comfortable.
Thank you, Doctor. It means a lot to hear you say that.
Speaking of hard work, I wanted to tell you about something I did recently. I went hunting and I managed to track a deer for three hours before finally getting a successful shot.
It definitely does. And I think it's important to have hobbies and interests outside of caregiving, you know?
Anytime, Doctor. It's my pleasure.
Sure, that sounds great. Where would you like to go?
Perfect, I've been craving their veggie sandwich. Let's go!
